name: rtd-mcp-server
description: RTD MCP Server - Kod üretimi ve standart kontrolü için MCP sunucusu

scripts.copy-assets: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); const copyDir=(src,dest)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true}); fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true}).forEach(entry=>{const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name), destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name); entry.isDirectory()?copyDir(srcPath,destPath):fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath)})}; try{copyDir('config','dist/config'); console.log('✅ Config dosyaları kopyalandı')}catch(e){console.log('⚠️ Config kopyalanamadı:',e.message)}"

author: RTD Team
